articles.author: Madeline Roth
articles.title: Wendy Williams Diagnosed With Frontotemporal Dementia, Aphasia - The Daily Beast
articles.description: The former talk show host’s medical team revealed that her conditions—the same ones that plague actor Bruce Willis—have “already presented significant hurdles in Wendy's life.”
articles.content:
Wendy Williams has been diagnosed with frontotemporal dementia as well as the language disorder aphasia, her healthcare team announced in a press release Thursday morning.
Her team confirmed that af… [+4937 chars]
